properties.Name: CustomerProgram
properties.Description: The Program(s) in which a Customer participates.

Columns.Name: CustomerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer.

Columns.Name: MarketingProgramId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Marketing Program.

Columns.Name: CustomerProgramStartDate
Columns.Description: The starting date of the Customer's participation in a Program.

Columns.Name: CustomerProgramEndDate
Columns.Description: The ending date of the Customer's participation in a Program.

Columns.Name: CustomerProgramParticipationNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the Customer's Program participation.
